thread.section_title: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services | beliteweight.com
thread.title: Beau M.
thread.title_full: BeLiteWeight - Weight Loss Services reviewed by Beau M.

author: Beau M.
title: Beau M.
text: Unlike other hospitals where you go in for surgery and you are just a price tag to them, here We were greeted in the lobby by one of the doctors, but he took the time to explain every step to us. The doctor also made us feel at home and joked with us. The room we were in was like a CLEAN little hotel room. The staff was friendly and caring. Even after the surgery the doctors and staff were in checking on how we were feeling every day! At all hours when we needed help or were in pain the very quick response was relaxing and refreshing. I am happy to be a spokes person or recommend anyone!!!!
